description:
Get ready to experience a whole new world for your fitness. Get tons of high-fives from friends, earn discounts from fit-abulous brands and be an inspiration to your communities for not just one, but ALL your movements and tracked activities. 

Meet EveryMove: your fitness-tracking, motivation-hacking, habit-attacking community. Basically, we're a bunch of people who believe that good things come to those who sweat. 

Our easy-to-use exercise solution supports hundreds of apps, makes it easy to share exercise with friends, helps you earn real-world perks, and even lets you have an impact on your healthcare provider. 

Features:
-------

• SYNC YOUR WORKOUTS AUTOMATICALLY from your favorite tracking devices. We support 100s of the most popular fitness tracking apps and devices, so you can switch, share and track with the devices that fits your lifestyle best. 

• HEALTHKIT INTEGRATION In addition to the 50+ apps to which EveryMove is already connected, our new integration with HealthKit means we can collect your workout and step data from any other app that utilizes HealthKit.

• HUNDREDS OF ACTIVITIES. You have a routine that works for you, so you should get rewarded for all your movement.

• BUILD YOUR FITNESS-FOCUSED NETWORK and cheer each other on with comments, likes and share the love!

• INFLUENCE YOUR COMMUNITIES. Connect with friends, employers, health plans, and even your gym. See how your workouts can inspire positive change. 

• COMPETE on leaderboards. Partake in fitness challenges. 

• REWARDS FROM FITNESS-SAVVY BRANDS. Steep discounts, exclusive offers, even prizes from employers. Join the largest network of brands that want to reward your healthy lifestyle. 

• CHARITY DONATIONS. With many rewards companies also sponsor charity donations on your behalf – that’s double the recognition.

• AT-A-GLANCE STATS. Curious how you’re performing each week? Our activity dashboard gives you a quick look week to week so you can ensure you are on track to meet your goals. 


Shout-Outs from EveryMovers:
-------------------------

“I LOVE this! If you're an active person, then you get ton of rewards EASILY! I linked mine to MyFitnessPal and every time I log a workout in MFP it gives me points on this app. I've won THREE rewards so far in about 2 weeks just by being active almost daily. Love love love it.”

“Thank you for being a part of my life! I am stronger, more flexible, feel better in my own body, and am finally the losing weight that I've struggled with over the past decade....and it's because of you. Thank you!”

 “Nice easy to use app. Links to several other apps which makes it easy to earn rewards. A must have if you wear a fitbit!”

“The aggregation of all my active lifestyle apps and trackers makes it really nice to keep up with my running, walking, cycling, mountain biking, all in one place. Also the rewards are lots of fun!”


EveryMove Spotted in the Press: 
--------------------------
- Greatist: “Best Fitness Apps of 2014”
- Fitness Magazine: “Cash in on your healthy habits and earn some great deals!” 
- Time Magazine “Playing for Keeps” Smart-phone games could make health care more fun—and effective”
releaseNotes:
New in 2.5:

- Greatly improved Activity Stream experience
- New Today Widget to get at-a-glance view of your fitness and easy access to EveryMove
- More charity donations opportunities
- Improved Apps and Devices syncing.
- New integration with Adidas miCoach
